properties.title: Welcome to the AJF Framework Developer Website : Core Module

section.name: Welcome
section.p:
This module is the core module of AJF and contain all the bases functionalities :
Cache management
Configuration tools
AuditData definitions
Logger definitions
Mail Service
Helpers for Bean management, Code generation, Class managements, ...
section.subsection: You will found the reports in the left Project Documentation section. The most interestings are : coverage, javadoc and findbugs
